Julius P. J. Krebbekx Personal Webpage

Welcome to my webpage!

I am a PhD student in the Control Systems group of the Department of Electrical Engineering, Eindhoven University of Technology. My promotors are Amritam Das and Roland TÃ³th.

My project focuses on shaping the performance of nonlinear control systems. My work combines classical operator-based methods, pioneered by legends such as George Zames and Jan Willems, with modern results. The goal is to develop loop-shaping techniques for nonlinear systems that go beyond stability analysis. For more details, see my research page.
